name: Novarine
description: Novarine is a sativa-dominant hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Caprichosa Thai and a Thai landrace line known for its richness in THCV. This strain is a rare and exotic strain that offers a unique cannabinoid profile with a 1:1 ratio of THC and THCV. Novarine is a potent strain that can produce a stimulating and energetic high.
